TopicTitle: [v0.24] Tarsier Space Technology (v4.5c Now with GALAXIES!!!)

Articles.Content: I'm having a look at these logs and must admit I don't see where most of the problems are coming from, but I can certainly work on making the code a bit more resilient so it doesn't fail when things like the galaxies systems don't initialise properly.

Hi, it seems this mod somehow messes with scansat. Can't use one while the other is installed.

Any tips how to overcome this problem? I really love both mods.

Great job btw.
i am using scansat with this mod and it works (scansat)

I'm having a look at these logs and must admit I don't see where most of the problems are coming from, but I can certainly work on making the code a bit more resilient so it doesn't fail when things like the galaxies systems don't initialise properly.

would be great because i love your mod !
I can't activate my telescope. When I right click it just gets highlighted green. Someone pls help!
I can't right click on telescope it only highlights as green need help pls
Umm. Are you using KSP .25 'cause this mod is made to work with.24.2?
The Tarsier Large Crewed Lab part seems to just create a non-functional copy of Squad's Mobile Processing Lab.

The Tarsier Large Crewed Lab part seems to just create a non-functional copy of Squad's Mobile Processing Lab.

It has a part that was added by accident. He or she has something in mind with that part, when its finished. I just remove it.
An awesome extension would be to gain reputation point for the pictures. Having actual pictures to show gives you more reputation than just showing numbers

@tobyb121, is there a workaround for the exception thrown in TarsierSpaceTech.TSTProgressTracker.OnLoad? I have another user of our mods running into that issue. Thanks!
I would love to see this mod updated to .25. I't adds a whole lot to game!
Agreed. A space program has GOT to have space telescopes.

Do you use Distant objects? If yes disable flare glow temporarely!

Do you use Distant objects? If yes disable flare glow temporarely!

how to do that?

how to do that?

in the toolbar mod (hope you have) press the Distant object button and will appear a config window, the first button is Disable flares

you have to configure toolbar to appear the distant object button that appears only in the space center overview
